content:
The enemy continued the drone terror of the south and southeastern regions this night. Under the sight of the enemy again was the energy infrastructure.

About thisreportedDefense Forces of the South of Ukraine.

The combat work of air defense forces lasted more than 3 hours.

Shahed-131/136 drones maneuvered in several areas, trying to both expose and bypass air defense systems.

In the operating zone of the South Defense Forces, there were effective to work on 7 barrading shells: 4 shot in the sky in Dnipropetrovsk, 2 - in the Odessa region and 1 - in Kherson region.

It is noted that the hits are not allowed, but in the Dnipropetrovsk region fragments of a whipped drone fell in the territory of the elevator.

As a result, a fire broke out, which firefighters quickly extinguished. No critical damage or casualties were recorded.

As reported by the Armyinform, as a result of Russian attack by shock drones of the type of Shahd in the Poltava regiondamagedInfrastructure object.

At night, 12 shock UAV-136/131 punches were recorded, nine of themwas destroyedunits of mobile fire groups of Defense Forces of Ukraine.
title: The Defense Forces reported the details of the night attack by enemy drones
description: This was reported by the Defense Forces of southern Ukraine.    Combat work of the Air Defense...
author: Army Inform
